    • toString

    • box

      public static Class<?> box(Class<?> primitive)

    • convert

      public <T> T convert(Object source, Class<T> type)
      Performs conversion using methods annotated with ConverterMethod first. A method with a more specific compatible parameter type take precedence over a method with more general type. If conversion cannot be done with converter methods then constructor conversion is attempted in a similar way - a constructor with a more specific compatible parameter types takes precedence over a less specific.
      Specified by:
      convert in interface Converter

    • acceptConstructorConversionTargetType

      protected boolean acceptConstructorConversionTargetType(Class<?> type)
      Allows to filter out constructor conversions. This implementation filters out JSONObject and JSONArray.
      Parameters:
      type -
      Returns:
